thread.section_title: Ticketbis opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Ticketbis | ticketbis.net
thread.title: David Chainho

author: David Chainho
title: David Chainho
text: About a month ago I bought 2 tickets (around 500â‚¬) for an Ed Sheeran Concert in Madrid, which is happening in 8th April. One week later someone from ticketbis called me telling me that they would be sending me the tickets right away, which didn't happen. I've tried to contact them by e-mail and by the online chat for days, and still don't have my tickets. It seems like that the critics of ticketbis service are indeed true - this is a scam.
